data.eml:eml: Notes on fine structures of Chauliops with descriptions of two new species from China (Insecta: Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Malcidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gao, Cuiqing, Bu, Wenjun (2009): Notes on fine structures of Chauliops with descriptions of two new species from China (Insecta: Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Malcidae). Zootaxa 2295: 1-14, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191558
